definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
a girl's teenage years (idiom); maidenhood/a budding beauty
used erroneously for 豆蔻年華|豆蔻年华, a girl's teenage years (idiom); maidenhood/a budding beauty

sentences.english: When it's time for Carnaval Miami , the city goes wild.
sentences.chinese: 當邁阿密嘉年華會開始時，整個城市都瘋狂了。

sentences.english: Let's go to Brazil and join their Carnival.
sentences.chinese: 我們去巴西參加他們的嘉年華會吧。

sentences.english: Use Flower Time Multiple-Purpose Eye Protection Package in beauty parlor professional nursing.
sentences.chinese: 美容院專業護理使用花樣年華多效護眼套裝。

sentences.english: Welcome to the first CarnEVIL party at Circus Barbarossa.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到芭芭露莎第一屆鬼屋嘉年華萬聖節派對。

sentences.english: Our street puts on a carnival every year.
sentences.chinese: 我們街的居民每年舉行一次嘉年華會。

sentences.english: The time of life is short ; to spend that shortness basely, it would be too long.
sentences.chinese: 人生苦短，若虛度年華，則短暫的人生就太長了。

sentences.english: Welcome to Shui Mu Nian Hua Bath Club.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨水木年華沐浴休閒俱樂部。

sentences.english: All about dream efforts, will make people feel shame to idle away one's time.
sentences.chinese: 所有關於夢想的努力，都會讓虛度年華的人感到羞恥。

sentences.english: He had consumed the best years of his life in prison.
sentences.chinese: 他在獄中度過了他的大好年華。

sentences.english: With the time elapsing, which taking the love away, but still can't realize the once dream.
sentences.chinese: 時光的流逝帶走了年華，卻不曾實現曾經的夢想。

sentences.english: At the carnival they had all kinds of booths4.
sentences.chinese: 在嘉年華會上，孩子們有各種各樣的小亭子。

sentences.english: Graceful jading years often goes beauty no longer, state of mind also becomes eccentric.
sentences.chinese: 曼璐年華老去紅顏不再，心態也變得古怪。

sentences.english: We use the most beautiful years to weave the myth.
sentences.chinese: 是我們用自己最美的年華，編織着神話。

sentences.english: A college boy died suddenly at the playground.
sentences.chinese: 花樣年華的大學男生猝死在操場。

sentences.english: So grasp the youth to lead a chic life.
sentences.chinese: 把握青春年華，活得瀟瀟灑灑。

sentences.english: Desperado, oh, you ain't getting no youger.
sentences.chinese: 亡命之徒，哦，你已經年華老去。

definition: in a flash/in the blink of an eye/to glance
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
to fail to live up (to expectations)/unworthy (of trust)/to let down/to betray (hopes)/to disappoint
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
in the twinkling of an eye/in a flash/to turn one's eyes
